function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of regulation and data in the informal economy in public spaces","Impact":"Inability to control the spread of contagious diseases and ensure proper health measures in informal sector","Mitigation":"Implementing data collection and regulation strategies, providing support for informal workers","Technologies":"Data collection technologies, digital platforms for support","People":"Informal workers, public","Owner":"Government, local authorities"},{"Description":"Global interconnected settlement system","Impact":"Potential for rapid global spread of contagious diseases due to lack of standardized regulations","Mitigation":"Developing global-scale regulatory systems, implementing city-level regulations with global implications","Technologies":"Global data sharing platforms, advanced modeling and forecasting tools","People":"Global population, urban planners","Owner":"International organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for urban-scale regulations at a global scale","Impact":"Inability to address global consequences of local regulatory decisions, increased risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Integration of urban-scale regulations into global decision-making processes, awareness and education on global interconnectedness","Technologies":"Global communication platforms, data analytics for global impact assessment","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, global population","Owner":"International organizations, government authorities"}]}
